name: PARTNERCOMM / External Site
description: A lightweight marketing site built for PartnerComm, Inc. This project was a departure from our past design-first WordPress sites, with a focus on SEO and site performance.

name: HNTB / Benefits Site
description: A comprehensive benefits site built with our custom content management system on top of WordPress, making the creation and custimization of pages a breeze for content managers.

name: PARTNERCOMM / Figma Template
description: In an attempt to bridge a knowledge gap between our designers and developers, I built this template as a starting point for new web projects. The aim was to provide guidelines for what our devs need to get started and a design-agnostic template that demonstrates how web pages are constructed.

name: PERSONAL / Portfolio
description: This site is bare-bones trial run for Vite and an exercise in getting away from comforts like SCSS and Vuetify.
